QuestData.Title: Denalan's Earth
QuestData.Description: Are you heading to the south? To Lake Al'Ameth? If so, then I have a task I might ask of you...$B$BMy colleague Denalan has a camp along the eastern end of the lake, where he is studying and experimenting on the plant life of Teldrassil. He requested a package of rare earths from Darnassus and it was late, only recently arriving here in Dolanaar.$B$BCan you take the package to him?
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the package of Rare Earth to Denalan at Lake Al'Ameth.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, it's here! I have waited for this rare earth for quite some time. I hope it's still fresh...$B$BThank you for bringing it to me, $n. You are a $r who is generous with $ghis:her; time.
